mapper.insert: insert into user(email, password, nickname, phone_number) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phoneNumber})

choose.when:
insert into user(email, nickname, profile_img) values (#{email}, #{nickname}, #{profileImgUrl});
insert into sns_info(user_id, email, sns_type) values((select user_id from user where email = #{email}) , #{email}, #{snsType});
choose.otherwise:
insert into user(nickname, profile_img) values (#{nickname}, #{profileImgUrl});
insert into sns_info(user_id, sns_type) values((select user_id from user where nickname = #{nickname}) , #{snsType});

mapper.select: select user_id, email, password, nickname, profile_img as profile_img_url, created_at, phone_number, status, role from user where user_id = #{userId} and status != 'deleted'
select user_id, email, password, nickname, profile_img as profile_img_url, created_at, phone_number, status from user where email = #{email} and status != 'deleted'
select user_id, email, password, nickname, profile_img as profile_img_url, created_at, phone_number, status from user where nickname = #{nickname} and status != 'deleted'
select user_id, email, nickname, profile_img as profile_img_url, created_at, phone_number, status from user where status != 'deleted'
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password} where user_id = #{userId}
update user set status = 'deleted' where user_id = #{userId}
